mapper.select: select *,(SELECT username FROM sys_user where creator_id = user_id) as creator_name ,(SELECT username FROM sys_user where modifier_id = user_id) as modifier_name ,(SELECT customer_name FROM sal_customer where wms_transfer_order_sal.customer_code = sal_customer.customer_code) as customer_name ,(SELECT warehouse_name FROM wms_warehouse where wms_warehouse.warehouse_code = wms_transfer_order_sal.warehouse_code) as warehouse_name from wms_transfer_order_sal where to_sal_id = #{value}
